thing-type.label: 009402 10 Year Smoke Detector with Siren Function
thing-type.description: 10 Year Smoke Detector with Siren Function<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gtThis product combines a certified '10 year' stand-alone smoke detector with a plug-in Z-Wave module to form a wirelessly reporting automatically meshing smoke sensor plus wirelessly controllable indoor siren. The smoke detector is certified by the VdS for Q quality and DIN EN 14604 and satisfies all contemporary legal requirements.</p&gt <p&gtThe High-End 10 years smoke detector offers a test button conveniently accessible even with a broomstick when mounted on the sealing. The smoke chamber is monitored electronically to avoid any malfunction and wrong alerts. The device will also report its end of life to make sure it is getting replaced on time.</p&gt <p&gtAccording to the VdS 3515 (smoke sensors with radio communication) this device will relay all alarms to all other smoke sensors in the Z-Wave network to create a house-wide alarm. This connection of the smoke sensors is fully automated and needs no further configuration. The smoke sensors and the controller communicate via a secure protocol to prevent manipulation. </p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtInclusion Information</h2&gt<ul&gt<li&gtPressing the button 'Inclusion Button' for one second includes the device.</li&gt <li&gtIf the button is pressed for at least 2 seconds the inclusion will be done without the Security Command Class</li&gt </ul&gt<br /&gt<h2&gtExclusion Information</h2&gt<p&gt A single click on the button 'Inclusion Button' will exclude the device. </p&gt
